episodes.synopsis: A spacecraft is blown into the path of the sun, which could have cataclysmic repercussions for planet Earth as well as those on board.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: As the Aurora picks up speed, it's only a matter of hours until it burns, triggering a solar-storm event that will send Earth back to the Stone Age.
episodes.title: Episode 2

video.title: Exploding Sun
video.synopsis: A space shuttle is hit by a solar storm and sent hurtling toward the sun, triggering a solar flare-up that could have cataclysmic repercussions.
